description:
An ad-free and open-source YouTube client for legacy devices. SkyTube is a YouTube player that allows you to:
  • play YouTube videos
  • download videos
  • browse YouTube channels
  • search videos, music and channels
  • watch channels' playlists
  • view video comments
  • video swipe controls (volume, brightness, comments and description)
  • bookmark videos
  • import subscriptions from YouTube
  • channel subscription with non-intrusive notifications
  • subscriptions feed
  • view and download video thumbnails
  • explore Trending and Most Popular videos
In addition, SkyTube is equipped with a robust blocking attribute that allows you to avoid unwanted videos, with capabilities such as channel blacklisting/whitelisting, filtering, exclusions for low views and high dislikes, etc. All of this at the tips of your fingers! More features will be added in the near future.
